body:
Hello,

I have recently installed Ladybug and the python component necessary to open the program. However, anytime I load one of the exercises, I get the following error (attached image) I have installed and reinstall the python component many times but I always get the same error. How can I fix this? Many thanks!!

replies.body:
Hi Ernesto, this error means that Python 0.5.101 is not installed, but is necessary to run LadyBug. Can you make sure that you install it, by following the installation instructions that are available from the place where you downloaded the file? If you experience any issue while installing, please let me know, Thanks, Giulio
--
Giulio Piacentino
for Robert McNeel & Associates
giulio@mcneel.com

Hi Giulio,



Problem solved, I got confused with the program version. Many thanks!
